post.summary: Change password for the authenticated user
post.description: Change password for the authenticated user (admin or garden). Requires current password, new password, and password confirmation.
Send OTP code to user's email for password reset.
Reset password using email, OTP code, new password and confirmation.

get.description: Retrieve a paginated list of all child cards with their associated group and person type information. Supports filtering by search (child's or parent's name fields), phone, status, group_id, person_type_id, parent_code.

parameters.name: search
parameters.description: Search in child's and parent's name fields

post.description: Create a new child card with the provided information

group_id.description: ID of the associated garden group

parent_code.description: Optional parent access code (auto-generated if not provided)

get.description: Retrieve detailed information about a specific child card

put.description: Update an existing child card with new information

group_id.description: ID of the associated garden group

parent_code.description: Optional parent access code (auto-generated if not provided)

delete.description: Permanently delete multiple child cards by their IDs

post.description: Upload a new image for the card. If an image already exists, it will be replaced.

post.summary: Move multiple cards to a different group
post.description: Move multiple cards to a different garden group by providing an array of card IDs and a new group ID

card_ids.description: Array of card IDs to move

403.description: Forbidden - Group does not belong to user's garden

message.example: Group does not belong to your garden

post.description: Send OTP to the phone number associated with a card

phone.description: Phone number associated with the card

parent_code.description: Parent access code for the card

message.example: Invalid phone number or parent code

post.description: Verify OTP and return the complete card object if valid

phone.description: Phone number associated with the card

post.summary: Card login with phone and parent code (direct)
post.description: Authenticate a card using phone number and parent code directly, returns the complete card object if credentials match

phone.description: Phone number associated with the card

parent_code.description: Parent access code for the card

message.example: Invalid phone number or parent code

get.description: Retrieve a list of all cities with their country information

post.description: Create a new city with name and country

get.description: Retrieve detailed information about a specific city

put.description: Update an existing city with new information

get.description: Retrieve a list of all countries with their tariffs. Supports filtering by name and pagination.

post.description: Create a new country with name and tariff

get.description: Retrieve detailed information about a specific country

put.description: Update an existing country with new information

get.description: Retrieve a list of all devices. Supports filtering by name, status, garden_id. Pagination supported.

post.description: Create a new device for a garden. garden_groups is an array of group IDs.

get.description: Retrieve detailed information about a specific device.

put.description: Update an existing device. garden_groups is an array of group IDs.

delete.description: Delete a specific device by ID.

get.description: Retrieve a paginated list of all distributors with their associated country and city information.

parameters.name: search
parameters.description: Search in first_name, last_name, email fields

post.description: Create a new distributor with the provided information

get.description: Retrieve detailed information about a specific distributor

put.description: Update an existing distributor with new information

post.description: Authenticate a distributor using email and password
Logout the authenticated distributor

get.description: Get the authenticated distributor's profile information
Retrieve a paginated list of all gardens with their associated city and images. Supports filtering by name, address, city_id, tax_id, phone, email.

post.description: Create a new garden with the provided information

message.example: Garden and user account created successfully

get.description: Retrieve detailed information about a specific garden

put.description: Update an existing garden with new information

delete.description: Permanently delete multiple gardens by their IDs

get.description: Retrieve a paginated list of all garden groups with their associated garden information. Supports filtering by name and garden_id.

post.description: Create a new garden group with the provided information

get.description: Retrieve detailed information about a specific garden group

put.description: Update an existing garden group with new information

delete.description: Permanently delete multiple garden groups by their IDs

post.description: Upload a new image for a garden. Requires authentication.

delete.description: Deletes a garden image by ID. Requires authentication.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: ID of the garden image to delete

get.description: Retrieve a list of all parents with their associated group and card information

post.description: Create a new parent with the provided information

group_id.description: ID of the associated garden group

card_id.description: ID of the associated child card

get.description: Retrieve detailed information about a specific parent

put.description: Update an existing parent with new information

group_id.description: ID of the associated garden group

card_id.description: ID of the associated child card

get.description: Retrieve a list of all people with their associated person type and card information. Supports filtering by first_name, last_name, person_type_id, and card_id.

post.description: Create a new person with the provided information

person_type_id.description: ID of the associated person type

get.description: Retrieve detailed information about a specific person

put.description: Update an existing person with new information

person_type_id.description: ID of the associated person type

get.description: Retrieve a list of all person types

post.description: Create a new person type with the provided name

delete.description: Delete a person type by ID

409.description: Cannot delete person type - it is being used

message.example: Cannot delete person type as it is being used by cards or people
